title: Self-Regulated Learning Competency Enhancement Program for Medical School Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of learning strategies
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended learning environment using personal devices, with a focus on developing self-regulated learning strategies linked to clinical knowledge acquisition

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their learning strategies and develop improvement plans using the Self-Regulated Learning Measurement Tool (SRMC)
Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies—such as goal setting, resource management, and progress monitoring—to the process of acquiring clinical knowledge
Learners can continuously improve their self-regulated learning strategies based on peer feedback and instructor evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
